known_issues: Admin Panel button is missing from the page navigation

existing_features.title: Add a clearly visible 'Admin Panel' button/link in the main navigation header (Header.tsx) that navigates to the admin route (#/admin). The button should be consistently accessible on both desktop and mobile navigation menus, styled to match the existing maroon/gold theme.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add visible Admin Panel button/link in the navigation or page
